 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָשָׁה‎</span>] **verb** ==draw== (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***cleanse uterus*** of camel, Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> clean, ***stroke, the*** face, etc.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְשָׁא‎</span> (Talmud) wash the hands; Zinjirli <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎משׂי‎</span>[<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>] perhaps ***wash*** oneself, [[BDB#DHM|DHM]]<sup>Sendsch. 60</sup>); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִןהַֿמַּיִם מְשִׁיתִהוּ‎</span> [[Exod.2.10|Exod 2:10]] ***out of the water I drew him*** (used to explain <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎משֶׁה‎</span>, but see this below) **Hiph\`il** ***Imperfect*** suffix = **Qal**, figurative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַמְשֵׁנִי מִמַיִם רַבִּים‎</span> [[2Sam.22.17|2Sam 22:17]] = [[Ps.18.7|Ps 18:7]] (subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>).
